entry.title: Shampoo Bottles and Cleanser Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Shenzhen Zhanss Technology
Type: lash shampoo
Price: 29.00

Ever wanted to make your own shampoo bottles for your aftercare kits? Now you can with our easy to make DIY foaming lash shampoo bottles! We recommend 2 sachets per bottle.   Give each client 1 bottle and 2 sachets for them to make their own cleanser at home! Individual sachets are available to purchase for refills.

Included:

5 Empty reusable bottles with lids

10 sachets (3ml each)

TIP The more water you use, the denser the foam.

entry.title: Mulberry 100% Silk Mask
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lashes By Design
Type: Face Mask
Price: 9.99

Treat yourself to luxurious 100% silk on your face. Prevents breakout and rashes on your skin. 

Adjustable earloop strap to make the perfect snug and comfortable fit.

  • Made from 100% Mulberry Silk: Silk allows your skin to simply glide over the surface of the smooth fabric, where cotton can be more abrasive. This prevents acne and breakouts.
  • Machine Washable: Hand or machine wash cold delicate using a gentle detergent. Hang dry or tumble dry low, for 10 minutes.
  • Adjustable Ear Loop and Nose Clip: Mask can be adjusted to tailor to each individual face.
  • Filter Pocket (Filter Included): Mask can be fitted with loose filter material, including any kind of HEPA filter, which may improve effectiveness.
  • Hypoallergenic and Breathable: Very breathable and cool during the summer months. This mask provides a great combo of fashion and function.

Black is the most popular colour so grab them while they are still available!

entry.title: Brow Soap
entry.summary:
Vendor: Miss Pretty
Type: Brow Soap
Price: 9.25

Brows are in! Try a little styling with a mascara wand and our Styling Brow Soap. Excellent to cover up sparse areas, create a spiked or messy look, or combine with a brow lamination. The possibilities are endless!

Includes:

  • Tin with sliding lid
  • One brush


Directions:

  • Spray brush with a little water and shake off excess
  • Dip your brow brush into brow soap to lightly cover the bristles
  • Brush your brows a small piece at a time into the desired look
  • Don't be afraid to flick a few upwards for a natural tousled look
  • Leave on to dry

Ingredients:

Water, sucrose, stearic acid, sorbitol lauric acid, palm oil, coconut oil, olive oil, ethanol, propylene glycol, glycerin, sodium hydroxide, laurel Sodium Alchohol Sulfate, Cocoyl Glutamate, Sodium Lauryl sulphate, acrylate copolymer, hamamelis Virginiana extract

 *Wholesale pricing available when you login as wholesale*

Apply Here: Wholesale Account Application

entry.title: Foaming Lash Bath
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lcare
Type: Lash Shampoo
Price: 12.50

Would you like to offer your clients a high-end bubble foam with your label? We brought in our Premium Bubble foam with no label just for you! The foaming cleanser is made in South Africa and is our go-to foam for our clients. Try it today and see the difference quality cleanser makes! Add your logo and retail to your lash clients!

This product has been specifically formulated to cleanse and sanitize the entire eye area and is the ideal care product for wearers of lash and brow extensions. It also effectively removes makeup and will not break down the bond of the lash/brow adhesive.


Bubble Cleanser is full of natural ingredients specifically formulated to cleanse and remove makeup and leave your clients feeling refreshed.

  • Effectively removes makeup
  • Does not break down the bond of the lash/brow adhesive
  • Does not contain Sodium Lauryl Sulphate (SLS is a foaming agent used in brake fluid that can have a drying effect on the skin)
  • Contains 4 natural ingredients. Rose Pelargonium, Aloe Vera, Citrus and Tea Tree extract
  • Gentle on the eyes
  • Only a small amount of product is needed to create a lather to cleanse and soothe the entire eye area
  • Beautiful packaging eliminates the need for a product stand
  • EU Compliant
  • Vegan-friendly
  • pH Balanced to diminish the risk of eye irritation


Ingredients: Aqua, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Acrylatec Copolymer, Aloe Ferox Leaf Gel, Glycerin, Cocamide DEA, Polysorbate 20, Phenoxyethanol (and) Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Hydroxide, Orange Fruit Oil, Rose Pelargonium Flower Oil, Tea tree Leaf Oil, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Rooibos Leaf Extract.

Suggested Retail Price: $26

Login to Apply for PROFESSIONAL DISCOUNT

entry.title: Lash Bloom™ Conditioner and Enhancer Serum
entry.summary:
Vendor: Alice
Type: Growth Serum
Price: 10.00 - 70.00 (2 variants)

Everyone wants long and beautiful lashes, the epitome of glamour and chicness. With our lash and brow conditioner serum, your lashes will look and feel like you’ve always wanted them to. By applying the Serum once or twice per day to the base of your eyelashes, your lashes will look years younger!

Safe to use with Eyelash Extensions

Results vary from client to client, but we love this product so much that it comes with a no-hassle 100% money-back guarantee.

Ingredients: Purified Water, Sodium Chloride, Benzalkonium Chloride, Citric Acid, Disodium Phosphate, Cellulose Gum, Hyaluronic Acid, Polypeptide.

Testimonials:

I just wanted to thank you so much for introducing me to the Lashes By Design eyelash enhancer serum! I have been using the product for over a month now and the results have been AMAZING!  Prior to using the product, I always had short, fine and damaged lashes. Since using this product I have noticed a huge difference in the overall length, thickness and fullness in both my top and lower lashes. I am so happy that I can finally wear a thicker lash, and I rarely feel the need to apply mascara on my lower lashes. I think the best part about this product is that it only takes 20 seconds to apply. It is so easy and I have been blown away by the results!  I can't wait to see the results after another month of use! 

Marla, Oct 2015

 

After using the lash growth serum for a couple of months then getting a lash lift my results are dramatic! I used to get extensions but due to an allergy have switched to lash lifts. This round when I saw my lashes they looked just as long and curly as my old extensions! I was shocked. Beautiful work  :) Thanks!!

Jenna, May 2015

 

We just measured a 14 mm lash on the inner corner of my lashes!  I can't believe it!

Silvana, Nov 2015

entry.title: Zensa Numbing Cream 30g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Alera Skin Care
Type: Topical Anaesthetic
Price: 47.00

Formulated for painful procedures like waxing, microblading, injections, tattooing and more.


what's included

  • Maximum strength 5% lidocaine
  • Lasts 2-3 hours and is safe to reapply on broken skin to extend numbing sensation
  • Natural pH formulation is safe to use on the most sensitive areas like the bikini area and lips
  • Does not contain vasoconstrictors that will affect the settling of ink
  • Vitamin E acts as an anti-inflammatory to boost the healing process
  • Vegan & steroid-free

Who can use Zensa:

Common applications include tattoos and piercings, microblading/permanent makeup, micro needling, fillers/botox injections, waxing and laser hair removal, electrolysis, as well as relief for arthritis, dialysis, shots or vaccinations. Water-based, non-oily formulation leaves no trace when absorbed.

Ingredients

Active ingredient: Lidocaine 5%

Inactive ingredients: Benzyl Alcohol, Carbopol, Lecithin, Propylene Glycol, Vitamin E Acetate, Purified Water

entry.title: Rroir Lash Sealer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Beauty Channel
Type: Lash Protector
Price: 19.00

Rroir Clear Coating forms a thin barrier to protect against oils and makeup that break down the adhesive. This product not only gives the extensions a maximum bond but also gives them a beautiful and glossy coating.
For best results, use this sealant daily to extend the life of your lash extensions.

Please Note: Not for use on Volume lash extensions as it will close the fans. We recommend this product for Classic and Elipse Lashes Only.

Details

  • Will prolong the life of eyelash extensions
  • Give your lashes an attractive glaze, they will look fresh and shiny
  • Perfect to be used in conjunction with any mascara.
Ingredients:  Nettle extract: Contains vitamin A & C, and mineral to nourish dry damaged eyelashes and make eyelashes shine and strong. Witch Hazel extract: Sterilizing, antiseptic, and hydrating effect. Panthenol: Natural fat-soluble extract contains vitamin B5 with a rich moisturizing and antiseptic effect. Hydrolyzed Collagen: Anti-aging, anti-wrinkle effect. Tightens skin and increases resilience. Betaine: All-natural moisturizing solution extracted from sugar beetroot prevents dehydration, and adds sheen and volume to eyelashes

Features:

  • Makes eyebrows thick and gives a fuller look.

Description:

The Mina Brow Nourishing oil is a natural product that gives nourishment to your eyebrows. This makes your eyebrows fuller. It not only makes them look beautiful but also make your eyebrows strong by strengthening them. The essential oils like Almond oil, castor oil, Argan oil, Rosemary oil and geranium oil gives your eyebrows the entire amount of nourishment it requires. Castor oil promotes the growth of your eyebrows and preserves their shape for a long time. For best results can be used at night time as the oil will stay for a longer period while sleeping and will be more effective. Apply this daily and get your desired eyebrows.
